It would be harder to tell if your disquised if everyone's name was one colour. I think they should all be grey.

know that they are one.

They could just look at the scoreboard and find your name under the prisoner tab. The colors make it easier for everybody to figure out whats going on.

You just have to post ban requests for the rdmers/ hope somebody else does.
